additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Each pack contains the juice of: Apple (37.5%)*, Carrot (30%)*, Orange (14%)*, Pear (9.5%)*, Pineapple (7.5%)*, Passionfruit (1%)*, Banana (<1%)*, Food Acid (Malic Acid, Citric Acid), Vitamin C, Natural Flavours. *Reconstituted Juice

additionalProperty.name: Dietary
additionalProperty.value: No Preservatives, Source of Vitamin C, No Added Sugars, No Artificial Flavours or Colours

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not purchase if pack is open or torn.

description: V8 Juice Tropical with apple, pineapple, passionfruit and carrot. Contains 1 serve of fruit and 1 serve of veg per 250mL.
name: V8 Tropical Juice Multipack 250mL
